title: Special Delivery
description: Free flowers every month for a year! Recently widowed Amy was delighted to find that she had won. Flowers have always been a big part of her life. But delivery driver Dave brings more than just bouquets. Can he help Amy find happiness again? Will Amy get even more than she bargained for?Special Delivery is includedÂ in the Seasons of Love boxed set.
author: Lia Fairchild
